title: mari65
author: mari65
content: So, I'm seeing some pretty mixed reviews on this game, unfortunately, sad.gifThat and, apparently for PC users it has an issue with crashing (although that has reportedly been patched).But I wanna know from any Neoseekers that got the game Sonic forces mod apk, what are your thoughts on it? The game does look fun to me, so I wanna get it, but I don't have a lot of time or money so I wanna know if it is worth it first embarrassed.gif
